siteMetadata.description: This is the blog from Mario Fernandez, a Software Developer working for ThoughtWorks
siteMetadata.author: Mario Fernandez

frontmatter.title: The Behavioral Interview
frontmatter.description: The behavioral interview is the last component of the FAANG interview. Less technical yet challenging, as you need to talk about your experience effectively

frontmatter.title: The System Design Interview
frontmatter.description: The system design interview is an unavoidable part of interviewing at FAANG. Let's see how to prepare for them successfully

frontmatter.title: Tips for Coding Interviews at FAANG
frontmatter.description: Coding interviews at FAANG are difficult. Let me share some tips that helped me go through these interviews successfully

frontmatter.title: How not to do a take-home coding assignment
frontmatter.description: A bad experience in a take-home coding assignment can ruin how a candidate perceives your company. Let's talk about some anti-patterns
